text:
Near Earth Autonomy | Robotics Engineers, Full Stack Web Developers, Project Managers, Embedded Engineers, and more | Pittsburgh, PA | ONSITE http://nearearth.aero

Near Earth Autonomy is creating a future where unmanned aircraft are commonplace and safe. Our work enables a range of unmanned aircraft, from sub-meter UAVs to full scale helicopters, to operate across applications in mobility and inspection.

We make autonomous flying robots. See them in action on our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/nearearthautonomy

These robots aren't going to fly themselves, themselves! Apply now at: https://nearearthautonomy.applytojob.com
